Room.Name: Khelleva Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the southern end of Khelleva Circle, on Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Khelleva Circle is named after the Khelleva Family, who in fact built this fine architectural circle. The traffic circle connects Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs to the south, Rosecrest Street and Khelleva Drive. The circle continues around to the northwest and northeast. There is a large tree in the center of the circle that a number of people have decided to rest under in the warm sun.
